name: Happi Oku
description:
A change of pace for infinite runners. Well, it's an infinite walker. Not sure where to go with it really, but one day I will finish it. Until then, enjoy!

Tap the sky to jump, or the floor to slide. When you run out of lives you get 10% of the coins you're carrying put into your bank, so save up for that chicken hat!

Twitter @LittleFishGames
